original_text: And when he had opened the second seal, I heard the second beast say, Come and see.
korean_text: 둘째 인을 떼실 때에 내가 들으니 둘째 생물이 말하되 오라 하니

sentences.original_text: And when he had opened the second seal
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 두 번째 인을 떼었을 때

sentences.original_text: I heard the second beast say
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 두 번째 짐승이 말하는 것을 들었으니
